metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician
content:
Chewy Pharmacy is hiring with starting wages up to $19.75 per hour!
Consistent shifts every week
 
Our Opportunity:  
Chewy, America’s #1 pet pharmacy, is seeking Certified Pharmacy Technicians with an active CPhT and TX State Board of Pharmacy license to join our amazing Pharmacy team in Dallas, TX! Are you looking for a hands-on, high-growth position working in a non-retail environment? If so, this might be the role for you.  There are several reasons why people choose to work and stay at Chewy – competitive pay, great perks, opportunities for advancement, and, oh yeah, the ability to make pets, pet parents, and pet partners super happy! For these reasons and many more, we would love for you to apply so we can share more about the great opportunities we have for you! 
Why you’ll love working here: 

Competitive starting wages with opportunities for wage increases starting at 90 days 
Access to competitive benefits and personal and leadership development programs to support your career growth
Employee 20% discount program at Chewy for all your pet needs
You will work with a great team that cares about pets, pet parents, and pet partners
Opportunity for learning and development to better yourself and Chewy! 

What You’ll Do: 

Maintain a safe and clean pharmacy by complying with procedures, rules, and regulations
Receive and count inbound freight, and store in assigned locations
Utilize computers to research pet parent orders
Accurately fill orders, including the selection of correct medication, counting medication quantity, and labeling vials/packaging
Package orders for shipment and transport/load onto carrier vehicles
Complete inventory cycle counts to verify inventory accuracy
Replenish Pharmacy inventory and non-inventory supplies
Assist Pharmacists in medication dispensary tasks, as needed 

What You’ll Need: 

Be at least 18 years old and have an active National Pharmacist Tech Certification (PTCB) and the appropriate licensure in the state of the pharmacy you are working at, and other states and credentials as required
Great attention to detail when filling pharmacy orders
A positive attitude in a team and safety-oriented environment
Pride in your work and in every order you fill for our pet parents
Ability to stand for extended periods of time, walk up to 2 miles per shift, and lift 25 pounds either with or without reasonable accommodations
Basic computer skills 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

questions.label: Are you 18 years of age or older?
Have you been employed by Chewy in the past?
Are you legally authorized to work in the United States without employer support or sponsorship?
Are you willing to submit to a post-offer, pre-employment background check and drug test?
Do you live within a commutable distance to our site in Dallas, TX?
Are you currently licensed as a Pharmacy Technician in the state of Texas?
How did you hear about Chewy?
Will you require sponsorship to work in the United States at any time in the future?

If you were hired at Chewy, what shift would you prefer to work? Day (Morning start time) or Night (Evening Start Time)? Your preference will be taken into consideration should you be selected for the role, but we cannot guarantee that we will be able to accommodate your request.

values.label: Open to Day or Night Shift

questions.label: SMS Consent: By providing my telephone number on this employment application form, I consent to receive automated text messages and pre-recorded voice messages from Chewy at that telephone number regarding any matter related to my job application to Chewy. Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

questions.description: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *
questions.label: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *
